General.Name: China Camc Engineering Co Ltd
General.Description: China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, and manufacturing equipment, construction, engineering contracting, investment, asset operation, and logistics business in China. It offers engineering contract services in industrial, agricultural, water engineering, power, communications, petrochemical, architecture and municipal administration, mining and underground engineering, and other projects, as well as invests in various projects. The company provides design and consulting services for hospitals and health centres, modern logistics, energy and environmental protection, industry and scientific engineering, and water engineering and environment, as well as culture, tourism, and commerce sectors. In addition, it is involved in equipment research and development, and manufacture for passenger ropeways, automatic logistics and warehousing, lifting machinery, and bulk solids handling applications. Further, the company engages in the investment and operation of industrial parks and water treatment plants. Additionally, it provides trading and logistics services for energy, transportation, petrochemical, agriculture, light industry, housing construction, municipal works, mechanical engineering, and other industries. China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China. China CAMC Engineering Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China National Machinery Industry Corporation.
